rule.description: The Launch, Sound, Movie, ResetForm, ImportData, Hide, SetOCGState, Rendition, Trans, GoTo3DView and JavaScript actions shall not be permitted. Additionally, the deprecated set-state and noop actions shall not be permitted.
rule.test: S == "GoTo" || S == "GoToR" || S == "GotToE" || S == "Thread" || S == "URI" || S == "Named" || S == "SubmitForm"

error.message: Unknown or not permitted action type
